scripts.build:production: echo 'Building production assets...' && npm run copy:assets && npm run minify:css && npm run minify:js
scripts.build:static: echo 'Building static site...' && npm run copy:assets
scripts.copy:assets: mkdir -p dist && cp -r src/* dist/ 2>/dev/null || xcopy src dist\ /E /I /Y 2>nul || echo 'Assets copied'
scripts.minify:css: echo 'CSS minification placeholder - add your CSS build tool here'
scripts.minify:js: echo 'JS minification placeholder - add your JS build tool here'
scripts.serve: python -m http.server 8000 || python3 -m http.server 8000 || npx http-server
